name: CATASTERISM
description:
You are Merope, a PhD student at the University of Atlas. It's Tuesday. You have a shift to pick up at work, a meeting to attend with your thesis advisor, and a difficult conversation to have with your dearest friend.

Now get through the goddamn day.

  • Fullscreen for best results
  • Five endings informed by your choices
  • Soundtrack by Merraine
  • Logo art by Crumb
  • Words and code by Waverly SM
